contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Optimising content control for developers in XbyK
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Ben Quinlan, Director and Solution Architect from Kentico Gold partner Zeroseven has given the Kentico community two great contributions - an open-source integration to add content type restrictions to website channels and a blog post describing the what _and_ why of this integration. Awesome stuff!
